    • Method Detail

      • addPanel

        public void addPanel(java.lang.String title,
            PreferencePanel panel)
        Parameters:
        title - The title of this panel, that will be visible in the JTree on the left side of the dialog. You can use a dot (.) to group panels in the tree: for example title "Display.Colors" will be arranged under "Display" in the tree (but "Display" needs to exist). Grouping goes only one level deep.
        panel - use @link{PreferencePanel.builder()} to construct an @link{PreferencePanel}.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if title has already been claimed by another PreferencePanel
